short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Kuromi’s playful and cheeky vibe to your new tab with the Kuromi Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring her adorable yet mischievous style, this extension adds personality and charm to your browsing. Access your favorite sites easily, add custom shortcuts, and stay on schedule with the built-in calendar and clock. Browse effortlessly with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy Kuromi’s delightful and lively design.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly reach your most-loved websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Tailor your tab with links you use frequently.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on track with the integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search seamlessly using your preferred engine.
Discover more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
